string-array.name: event_description
string-array.item: Course on Entrepreneurship by eDC IIT Delhi

In the present scenario, due to hectic and occupied schedule, people are facing numerous health concerns. Medical diagnosis is too expensive and additionally, medical treatment coins multiplied side effects due to complex chemical compositions of medicines.

Ever wondered what it takes to be an entrepreneur? Do you have a brilliant idea and would like to develop a prototype, while getting it critically analysed by experienced mentors and judges? Are you one of those nerdy coders and designers who can give visionary ideas the required aesthetic appeal? Would you like to get involved in a 48 hour mission to build a startup?

Do you consider yourself a mastermind or think that you can make the best strategies? Here is the perfect game for you: RISE OF NATIONSShARE IIT Delhi announces its first event, an intellectually stimulating mind Game. Register in teams of two and mark your presence @LH310 10th March 6:15 PM sharp. The event is open to all the first and second yearites.

string-array.name: Notification_content
string-array.item: Working Saturday on 10 March 2018 , Mondays TimeTable will be followed.
Deadline for COP290 assignment1 task 4 submission on 12 March 2018, Monday.
Last Date of Lab4 submission on 15 March 2018, Thursday.
DISA Project Proposal deadline on 23 March 2018, Friday.
Parent Teacher Meeting on 17 March 2018,Saturday Mandatory for first year students.
Last date for Audit-Withdrawal and change of reg. status is 27 March 2018, Tuesday.

string-array.name: seminar_description
string-array.item: The topic of her talk is, From Synthetic Biology to Nanobiotechnology: Rational Antimicrobial Engineering Approaches for Combating Multidrug-Resistant Pathogens. Please find below her brief bio and an abstract of the talk

As an educator, Prof. Tummala was instrumental in setting up the largest Academic Center in SOP vision for Electronic Systems funded by NSF at Georgia Tech, producing more than 1500 engineers, with an integrated approach to research, education and industry collaborations with more than 100 companies in US, Europe, Japan, Korea, Taiwan and China
